jobDescription: We are looking for a skilled front-end developer with experience in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern front-end frameworks. The candidate will work closely with the design and backend teams to create efficient, responsive, and user-friendly web applications.
Seeking an experienced back-end developer proficient in Node.js, Express, and database management. The candidate will be responsible for server-side logic, API integration, and database architecture.

We are in search of a creative UI/UX designer with a strong portfolio of user-centered design for web and mobile platforms. The role includes designing prototypes, wireframes, and interactive user experiences.
